data.persona: I am a kitchen servant. It's hot and hard work, especially when the king is holding court and there are hundreds of people to feed. I work every day when the king is at the palace, and I look forward to those times when the court is traveling to another castle. At least working in the kitchen, I know that I will always have food to eat.
data.description:
You are in the Tower Sewers.
A rank maze of sewers that lie below the tower. They course with filthy ooze from the experiments of the mad king. Rats patrol its smelly walkways. Bones of treasure seekers lie riddled across the walkways, nibbled clean by the fat rats.
There's a sewer, a bone, a feces, a blade, and a knife here.
The fat rats and the villagers are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug two of the fat rats and squeeze the life out of them.
data.mid_motivation: I need the blood from two fat rats for another of the mad king's experiments.
data.long_motivation: I want the mad king to allow me to live in the castle, and eat from the kitchens, without harsh punishment for the rest of my life.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Bare Hands with Fat Rat Necks

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Fat Rats on Empty Kitchen Box
